datatypeProperties.comment: Does the standard include criteria on the assessment of risks and impacts on water usage
Does the standard include criteria on emergency response plans or strategies to climate related hazards?
Does the standard have a general principle related to Environment and Social (E&S) Management Systems
Does the standard include criteria on environment and social risks mitigation and performance improvement

Does the standard include criteria on assessing the environmental risks and impacts of production/operations prior to any significant intensification or expansion of business operations/cultivation and infrastructure?
Does the standard require corporate social responsibility to be an explicit integral part of the organization’s mission or policy statement(s)
Does the standard include explicit requirements to establish and manage an internal control system which shall be responsible for the smooth implementation of the standards requirements
Does the standard include criteria on evacuation safety procedures?
Does the standard require policies and procedures to manage health and safety in the workplace?
Does the standard address issues relating to organizational capacity for continuous improvement of environmental and social (E&S) management
Does the standard include other administration and management related requirements not listed previously
Does the standard require procedures to be in place that effectively monitor and measure the effectiveness of E&S management systems?
Does the standard require provision of special access facilities to production sites for persons or workers with special needs
Does the standard require reporting and making publicly available E&S management system reports
Does the standard include criteria related to the respect of natural or cultural heritage surroundings in siting, design, impact assessment, and land  rights and acquisition (e.g. tourism sector)
Does the standard require a biodiversity management plan to continuously manage impacts during the extraction phase?
Does the standard require an assessment of risks and impacts on soil resources condition
Does the standard include explicit criteria on impacts assessment of water levels of surface and/or ground water?
Does the standard include explicit criteria on impacts assessment of the quality of surface and/or ground water?
Does the standard promote sustainability trainings for all workers
Does the standard include criteria related to locally appropriate principles of sustainable construction
Does the standard include criteria to ensure that relevant and up-to-date permits are held (such as water use rights or land use titles)?
